WRITING.TEXT: Little Witch Academia is a perfectly suitable anime for the younger crowd, if you at least think giant magic monsters are on the level you consider. The two movies have been dubbed, so I guess those will keep kids company before the dubbed TV series is released.
Oddly enough, I never shed a single tear when watching any media, this one being an example. Don't know why, but I still get the downbringing feeling in the gut/stomach area.
And my GODS, that voice acting is well-done. :D
